nodes.text: Annihilator 6K-A2 was the designation of a Colicoid battle droid that organized war games on the behalf of the Colicoid Creation Nest. It was destroyed around 3642 BBY.

Annihilator 6K-A2 appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a final boss in the "Colicoid War Games" flashpoint. He is voiced by Fred Tatasciore. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means it was destroyed.
